title: Episode 61 (LIVE): Scary Movies
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: How do you feel about scary movies? In this special LIVE episode, Dr. Ryan Martin is joined by Dr. Jason Cowell and student Sammy Alger-Feser to discuss scary movies. They dive into their feelings on the genre,  common physiological reactions, and why people may or may not choose to watch them!

description: How do you feel about scary movies? In this special LIVE episode, Dr. Ryan Martin is joined by Dr. Jason Cowell and student Sammy Alger-Feser to discuss scary movies. They dive into their feelings on the genre,  common physiological reactions, and why people may or may not choose to watch them!
